narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Residential Resources of Maine is a Case Management provider based in Keene, NH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $40.1M in Medicaid payments across 43K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This provider appears to operate as a fiscal intermediary or management organization, processing payments on behalf of many individual caregivers. High aggregate billing is expected for this type of entity.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $40.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
